titleStmt.title: Christs starre: or, A Christian treatise for our direction to our Sauiour, and for our conjunction with him Declaring Christs excellencie, our necessitie of him, his great loue and manifold mercies bestowed vpon vs; as also some of our duties. By W. Narne p. of Dysert.
titleStmt.author: Narne, William, 1583?-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I[ohn] L[egat] for Philemon Stephens and Christopher Meredith, and are to be sold at their shop, at the signe of the Golden Lyon in Paules Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: A variant (STC 18359.5) has Ralph Rounthwaite as publisher in imprint.
Reproduction of the original in Harvard University. Library.

place.placeName: their shop, at the signe of the Golden Lyon in Paules Church-yard
